verses.roman:
tāṅra avatāra eka śri-saṅkarṣaṇa
bhakta bali' abhimāna kare sarva-kṣaṇa

synonyms: tāṅra avatāra—His incarnation; eka—one; śrī-saṅkarṣaṇa—Lord Saṅkarṣaṇa; bhakta bali'-as a devotee; abhimāna—conception; kare—does; sarva-kṣaṇa—always.
translation: Lord Saṅkarṣaṇa, who is one of His incarnations, always considers Himself a devotee.
